about_the_game:
Raw survival in an unforgiving environment. A modern military sandbox containing foot, ground, and air combat. Vehicles include current and past icons, such as the A-10 Warthog, Abrams tank, and many more. Fully customizable weapons and vehicles. Built for clan mobilization, with management systems, and direct integration with discord. Control and defend your territory. Fight for resources. Participate in local politics... and much more!

Game-play
  • Highly customizable weapon system
  • Land, sea, and air vehicles
  • NPC population
  • Economic, and political game-play
  • Natural resource exploitation
  • Faction based systems
  • Dynamic conditional event systems

Environment
  • Seasons
  • Day/night cycles
  • Weather Extremes
  • Realistic Lighting

Multiplayer
  • Massive open world.
  • Open-ended/sandbox game-play
  • Text Chat
  • Voice and proximity voice

Clan Management
  • Web and in-game clan management
  • Very open framework to support your clans structure
  • Asset ownership management
  • Very customizable permission and access management
  • Association/alliance/coalition management
  • Operations planning and in-game integrations
  • Streamlined member on-boarding
  • Deep integration with external services like Discord and Steam

We have much more on the table, but implementation and/or operation may change before release. As things reach a more finished state, we will add more and more to this list.

content_descriptors.notes: Shooting at other humanoid creatures with intent to harm. Sci-fi/battle atmosphere. Mature references and contexts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu OR SteamOS
  • Processor: Multicore Processor @ 3Ghz or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 or ATI R9 380+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: SSD or better

  • OS: Ubuntu OR SteamOS
  • Processor: Multicore Processor @ 3Ghz or more
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: NVMe Storage
